DOC.detailed_description: Adiponectin ( APN ) abundant protein hormone derive adipose tissue . It suggest exert anti-inflammatory , antiatherogenic , vascular protective . Subarachnoid hemorrhage ( SAH ) comprise 5 % stroke high mortality permanent disability rate . Although many patient survive initial hemorrhage rebleeding , suffer long-term delayed neurological deficit ( DNDs ) , include stroke , delayed cerebral ischemia , cognitive neuropsychological abnormality seriously impact overall function quality life . Ruptured cerebral aneurysm common cause SAH . There grow evidence support APN act predictive factor SAH . The observational study focus predictive value serum adiponectin level aneurysmal subarachnoid hemorrhage ( aSAH ) .
